main_definition: Nobody refers to the absence of any person or implies that there is no one present in a certain situation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: No individual; an empty or non-existent entity.
meanings_and_examples.example: When I knocked on the door, nobody answered.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not a single person present in a particular place or situation.
meanings_and_examples.example: There was nobody at the bus stop when I arrived.

meanings_and_examples.definition: No one to blame for something negative that happened; not anyone responsible.
meanings_and_examples.example: Nobody is accountable for the accident on the highway.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not worth attention or consideration because there is no person involved with a particular issue.
meanings_and_examples.example: The company's recent PR crisis received little notice, as nobody was directly implicated.
